name: Country Chicken with Creamy Gravy (Gravy)
author: Rebecca Hooper

ingredients.name: c. plus 2 tsp. canned chicken broth

instructions: Combine butter and flour in saucepan on top of stove. Over low heat gradually add milk, and broth stirring until smooth. Cook until thickened. Add salt and pepper. Add chives if desired. Serve over chicken.
